title: "Finnish startup begins self-driving shuttle project in Switzerland"
excerpt: "Finnish startup Sensible 4 and Swiss Transit Lab have started a long-term pilot project in Switzerland using electric Level 4 autonomous shuttles. The first rides are already happening in Schaffhausen at the annual Swiss Public Transportation Association (VOV) event."
